mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_result (record_id, patient_id, doctor_id, test_code, test_name, test_area, test_date, result_value, result_note, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ( #{recordId}, #{patientId}, #{doctorId}, #{testCode}, #{testName}, #{testArea}, #{testDate}, #{resultValue}, #{resultNote}, 'PENDING', now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE test_result SET result_value = #{resultValue}, result_note = #{resultNote}, status = "COMPLETED", updated_at = now() WHERE test_result_id = #{testResultId}
